ingredients: 1 (12 pound)  bone-in ham ,   +   1/2 cup whole cloves, 1 (20 ounce) can pineapple rings in heavy syrup, 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage,   +   1/2 cup packed brown sugar, 1 (4 ounce) jar chopped maraschino cherries
